title: Earnings and employment from Pay As You Earn Real Time Information, seasonally adjusted
creator: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/office-for-national-statistics
summary: Earnings and employment statistics from Pay As You Earn (PAYE) Real Time Information (RTI), UK, NUTS 1, 2 and 3 areas and local authorities, monthly, seasonally adjusted. These are official statistics in development.
